DiagLib_McspiTestParams Struct Reference
MCSPI Diag Lib

Structure containing input parameters for MCSPI software test. More...

#include <diagLib_mcspi.h>

Detailed Description

Structure containing input parameters for MCSPI software test.

Field Documentation

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::baseAddr

Base address of the MCSPI module.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::chNumber

Select the MCSPI channel number.

uint16_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::dataCount

Amount of data to be tested in bytes. In case of using DMA transfer mode, dataCount should be multiple of 32bytes.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::internalLpbk

Set this value to TRUE if testing internal loopback. By default, it is set to TRUE by DiagLibMcspiTestParams_init function.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::mcspiEdmaEvtqNum

Event queue number for EDMA transfer.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::mcspiRxEdmaChNum

MCSPI RX Channel number for EDMA transfer.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::mcspiTxEdmaChNum

EDMA params are required for data transfer if DMA mode id chosen.MCSPI TX Channel number for EDMA transfer.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::performCacheOps

Set this value to TRUE if the cache is used for SPI transmission. Otherwise, set it to FALSE.

uint32_t* DiagLib_McspiTestParams::rxBuffer

Receive buffer pointer. User should allocate reqd memory for transmit buffer and assign here.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::spiClkMode

Select the clock mode for MCSPI channel.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::spiOutClk

Select the output clock frequency for MCSPI channel. Value to be given in Hertz.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::timeout

Choose the timeout value within which polling has to be completed failing which test API returns with a failure. Value to be given in milli seconds.

uint32_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::transferMode

Mode of transfer of data Refer enum DiagLib_McspiTransferMode_t.

uint32_t* DiagLib_McspiTestParams::txBuffer

Transmit buffer pointer. User should allocate reqd memory for transmit buffer and assign here.

uint16_t DiagLib_McspiTestParams::wordLen

Select Word length for data transfer. The values supported for MCSPI internal loopback test are 8, 16 & 32 bit only.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
